titles.title: Growing Jobs Through Capital Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to temporarily exclude capital gain from gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/31/2013--Introduced. Growing Jobs Through Capital Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude gain from the sale or exchange of a capital asset from gross income for income tax purposes. Terminates such tax exclusion two years after the enactment of this Act.
